Thirty-five of the 49 companies in the S&P 500 that reported earnings since Jan. 10 have topped analyst estimates, with General Electric Morgan Stanley and Bank of America Corp. due to release results today. Recent data suggested the economic performance in Europe has been okay, and probably somewhat better than people expected, said Adrian Eric Schmidt , a currency strategist at Lloyd TSB Bank Plc in London. The euro strengthened 0.5 percent against the dollar, and was 0.3 percent stronger versus the yen. The dollar weakened 0.2 percent

Within minutes of his decision being made public, the Washington-based Planned Parenthood Action Fund put out a statement criticizing the staunchly anti-abortion Mike Pence . As women voters in Indiana learn that one of Rep. Mike Pence 's top legislative priorities is effectively denying access to preventive care for millions of women, he will have difficulty winning their vote, Cecile Richards , the fund's president, said in a statement. But among conservatives, the only disappointment was that Mike Pence wasn't aiming at the White House rather than the Statehouse.
